Package it.polimi.ingsw.Model.GameTableObjects

Class Isle

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Model.GameTableObjects.Isle
All Implemented Interfaces:
DenyCardManager, StudentManager
public class Isle extends Object implements StudentManager, DenyCardManager
Isle of the game table, it contains students and deny cards.
